Title: The Ecstasy and the Agony
Writer: Darlene Hunt (creator), Hilly Hicks Jr. (teleplay), Jenny Bicks (story)
Actors: Laura Linney, Oliver Platt, Gabriel Basso, John Benjamin Hickey
Plot: Paul receives a promotion at work, and attends a congratulatory dinner without Cathy. Adam attends a house party, where teen-aged peer pressure places him between a rock and a hard place, ...
